meanings.definition: Not able to read or write.
meanings.sent1: The nonliterate man enjoyed listening to stories.
meanings.sent2: The nonliterate community relied on oral traditions for passing down knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The nonliterate child found joy in exploring the world through spoken tales.
meanings.sent4: Her nonliterate mind was a blank canvas waiting to be filled with stories.
meanings.sent5: The nonliterate population thrived through storytelling and verbal communication.

meanings.sent1: The nonliterate culture preserved their history through spoken word.
meanings.sent2: The nonliterate society had rich oral traditions.
meanings.sent3: In the nonliterate world, pens and papers were rare sights.
meanings.sent4: Her nonliterate approach to communication was refreshing in a digital age.
meanings.sent5: The nonliterate tradition of storytelling captivated listeners with its vivid imagery.
